summary: Defines a StyleAlignedSDXLPipeline that extends Stable Diffusion XL, incorporating a shared attention processor and several helper utilities (AdaIN, mean/std computation, latent and timestep retrieval) to enable style‑aligned image generation.
business_intent: Provide a plug‑and‑play pipeline for creating images with controlled visual style, supporting creative applications and research on style‑guided diffusion models.
